properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nikupe nini Mungu wangu,
nikupe nini Mungu wangu,
(cha kukupendeza,
cha kukupendeza,
cha kukupendeza
cha kukupendeza,
cha kupendeza,
siku hii ya leo) x2.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ninacho kidogo,
cha kukupendeza,
ewe Mungu wangu
Ninachoandaa siku hii
ya leo ndicho hiki Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sadaka ya leo,
ni sadaka safi, isiyo na doa.
Twakuomba Bwana
twakuomba Bwana
upendezwe nayo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Twatoa mkate,
twatoa divai,
upendezwe nayo.
Fedha nazo Bwana,
tunakutolea, upokee Bwana.
